name: Add tags to contacts in MailChimp based on Refiner surveys
description:
This template adds tags to contacts in Mailchimp based on responses collected in Refiner surveys.

The template expect your Refiner survey to have an NPS score question.

The template also expects your Mailchimp audience to have these tags available for use:
NPS: 1
NPS: 2
NPS: ...
NPS: 10

For more information about Mailchimp tags, [visit this link.](https://mailchimp.com/help/getting-started-tags/)

Note this template will only work if the "email" variable comes as a non-blank value in the Refiner submissions.
